components.hint: Please give as much detail as possible including dates and colleagues names (if known) so we can pass on your thanks.
components.hint:cy: Rhowch gymaint o fanylion â phosibl gan gynnwys dyddiadau ac enwau cydweithwyr (os yw’n hysbys) fel y gallwn anfon eich diolch ymlaen iddynt.
components.label: Tell us what we did well
components.label:cy: Dywedwch wrthym beth wnaethon ni’n dda
